verses.verse: <S%G3062>Finally,<s%> my <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> To <S%G1125>write<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G846>things<s%> [again] is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3636>trouble<s%> to me, and it is a <S%G804>safeguard<s%> for you.
<S%G991>Beware<s%> of the <S%G2965>dogs,<s%> <S%G991>beware<s%> of the <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G2040>workers,<s%> <S%G991>beware<s%> of the <S%G2699>false<s%> <S%G2699>circumcision;<s%>

for we are the [true] <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> who <S%G3000>worship<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G2744>glory<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and <S%G3982>put<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3982>confidence<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%>

<S%G2539>although<s%> I <S%G1473>myself<s%> might <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4006>confidence<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G243>else<s%> <S%G1380>has<s%> a <S%G1380>mind<s%> to <S%G3982>put<s%> <S%G3982>confidence<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> I far more: <S%G3123><s%>

<S%G4061>circumcised<s%> the <S%G3637>eighth<s%> <S%G3637>day,<s%> of the <S%G1085>nation<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G958>Benjamin,<s%> a <S%G1445>Hebrew<s%> of <S%G1445>Hebrews;<s%> as to the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> a <S%G5330>Pharisee;<s%>
as to <S%G2205>zeal,<s%> a <S%G1377>persecutor<s%> of the <S%G1577>church;<s%> as to the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> which is in the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> <S%G1096>found<s%> <S%G273>blameless.<s%>

But <S%G3748>whatever<s%> <S%G3748>things<s%> were <S%G2771>gain<s%> to me, <S%G3778>those<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> I have <S%G2233>counted<s%> as <S%G2209>loss<s%> for the <S%G1223>sake<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G3304>More<s%> <S%G3304>than<s%> that, I <S%G2233>count<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> to be <S%G2209>loss<s%> in <S%G1223>view<s%> of the <S%G5242>surpassing<s%> <S%G5242>value<s%> of <S%G1108>knowing<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> my <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> for <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G2210>suffered<s%> the <S%G2210>loss<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> and <S%G2233>count<s%> them but <S%G4657>rubbish<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that I may <S%G2770>gain<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

and may be <S%G2147>found<s%> in Him, not <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of my <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G1537>derived<s%> from [the] <S%G3551>Law,<s%> but that which is <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> which [comes] from <S%G2316>God<s%> on the <S%G1909>basis<s%> of <S%G4102>faith,<s%>

that I may <S%G1097>know<s%> Him, and the <S%G1411>power<s%> of His <S%G386>resurrection<s%> and the <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> of His <S%G3804>sufferings,<s%> being <S%G4832>conformed<s%> to His <S%G2288>death;<s%>
in <S%G7055>order<s%> that I may <S%G2658>attain<s%> to the <S%G1815>resurrection<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

Not that I have <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G2983>obtained<s%> [it], <S%G2228>or<s%> have <S%G2235>already<s%> become <S%G5048>perfect,<s%> but I <S%G1377>press<s%> on in <S%G1487>order<s%> <S%G2532><s%> that I may <S%G2638>lay<s%> <S%G2638>hold<s%> of that for <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> I was <S%G2638>laid<s%> <S%G2638>hold<s%> of by <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G80>Brethren,<s%> I do not <S%G3049>regard<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> as having <S%G2638>laid<s%> <S%G2638>hold<s%> of [it] <S%G3768>yet;<s%> but <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1520>thing<s%> [I do]: <S%G1950>forgetting<s%> what [lies] <S%G3694>behind<s%> and <S%G1901>reaching<s%> <S%G1901>forward<s%> to what [lies] <S%G1715>ahead,<s%>
I <S%G1377>press<s%> on <S%G1519>toward<s%> the <S%G4649>goal<s%> for the <S%G1017>prize<s%> of the <S%G507>upward<s%> <S%G2821>call<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

Let us <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> as <S%G3745>many<s%> as are <S%G5046>perfect,<s%> <S%G5426>have<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5426>attitude;<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> in <S%G5100>anything<s%> you <S%G5426>have<s%> a <S%G2088>different<s%> <S%G5426>attitude,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> will <S%G601>reveal<s%> that <S%G2532>also<s%> to you;
<S%G4133>however,<s%> let us keep <S%G4748>living<s%> by that <S%G846>same<s%> [standard] to <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G5348>attained.<s%>

<S%G80>Brethren,<s%> <S%G4831>join<s%> <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G4831>following<s%> my <S%G4831>example,<s%> and <S%G4648>observe<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2531>according<s%> to the <S%G5179>pattern<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> in us.

For <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4043>walk,<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G4178>often<s%> <S%G3004>told<s%> you, and <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> you <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2799>weeping,<s%> [that they are] <S%G2190>enemies<s%> of the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

<S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> is <S%G684>destruction,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2316>god<s%> is [their] <S%G2836>appetite,<s%> and [whose] <S%G1391>glory<s%> is in their <S%G152>shame,<s%> who <S%G5426>set<s%> their <S%G5426>minds<s%> on <S%G1919>earthly<s%> <S%G1919>things.<s%>

For our <S%G4175>citizenship<s%> is in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> from <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G553>eagerly<s%> <S%G553>wait<s%> for a <S%G4990>Savior,<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> will <S%G3345>transform<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of our <S%G5014>humble<s%> <S%G5014>state<s%> into <S%G4832>conformity<s%> with the <S%G4983>body<s%> of His <S%G1391>glory,<s%> by the <S%G1753>exertion<s%> of the <S%G1410>power<s%> that He <S%G1410>has<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> to <S%G5293>subject<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> to <S%G846>Himself.<s%>
